page.title: 14LOCAL SERVICES
page.content:
The Gullane branch of the Bank of Scotland employs one manager and 12 staff.It offers a wide range of services including financing,lending, deposit and cheque accounts,life insurance and house mortgages.It has an autoteller which can be used when the bank is closed.
Mr.Macdonald,postmaster at Gullane Post Office,employs three postpersons whose working day is 5.15am to 12.30pm The postboxes are emptied four times per day.As old age pensions are paid on Thursdays this is the busiest day.Dogs can be a problem as in 1984 a Gullane postman had his ear bitten off. The Post Office offers dry cleaning as a service and hires out videos, horror movies being the most popular.
